name: Medusa Queen
description: The Medusa Queen combines a beautiful yet deadly visage with snake-like hair, ready to ensnare foes with her petrifying gaze and poison-infused attacks.
memorable: Her ability to petrify enemies with a mere gaze, making her a strategic threat in combat.
goals: To ambush and overpower her foes using stealth and deception, and maintain her territory.
relations: Often encountered alongside other monstrous creatures or as a leader of such factions.
environment: Typically found in dark woods, ruins, or other secluded areas that offer cover and ambush opportunities.
strengths: Exceptional agility and stealth with a deadly gaze that can incapacitate enemies instantly.
weaknesses: Reliance on her gaze requires careful positioning; vulnerable to reflecting surfaces.
attacks: Capable of multiattacks using her snake hair and longbow, inflicting piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Petrifying Gaze, which can instantly petrify opponents while forcing them to strategize around her gaze.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and has a passive perception of 15, enhancing her ability to detect threats.
skills: Skilled in deception, insight, perception, and stealth, making her a master of ambush and evasion.
additional_information: Can charm enemies with her gaze via Imperious Command.
Uses Frenzy of Snakes to attack multiple foes in close proximity.
Exhibits a strong presence with good Charisma for manipulation.
Ambush predator that capitalizes on surprise.
